block.p: ROMITA--Louis. Senior VP of Castle Oil Corp. Loving husband of Anne. Devoted father of Lisa, Louis, Lynda, and the late Mauro. Loving grandfather of Noa McRiley and Louis McRiley. Cherished brother of Michael, Mary Digirolamo, Jack and Mauro. Reposing at Farenga Brothers Funeral Home, 920 Allerton Ave. Visitation on Thursday, 7-9pm and Friday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian burial Saturday, 10am, at the Holy Family Chapel in the College of New Rochelle.
